name: SpecCheck
headline: Unifying how the optical industry does business.
description: SpecCheck is an all-in-one solution that provides accurate prescription eyewear ordering and tracking, seamless billing, and streamlined communication between patients, eye doctors, and their lab partners. SpecCheck’s users work more efficiently and make fewer costly errors, increasing productivity and improving their overall workflow.
tags: industry:saas; industry:payments; industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:api; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Joe DeMaria, Founder
founders.description: Joe is the co-founder and CEO of SpecCheck. Beginning his career as an optician, Joe has worked on all sides of the optical industry and most recently managed top territories for Johnson and Johnson Vision. Joe’s ultimate vision (pun intended) is to create a piece of technology which unifies the patient, doctor, and third party vendors in a single elegant solution. When he’s not busy with SpecCheck, you can find Joe cooking in the kitchen, sailing, or playing video games.

founders.name: Arnold Villatoro, Founder
founders.description: Arnold is the co-founder and CTO of SpecCheck. Arnold has been a software engineer for almost a decade, starting his career at Workday. Most recently, he lead the payments team at Lyft. Outside of work and tech, Arnold enjoys working out, is a big foodie, has a cat named Peanut, and loves Super Smash Brothers. Fun fact: Arnold was born in Honduras!

# Free  **Software For Eye Care Professionals**
Submit Rx orders, check statuses, live chat with your lab partner, pay invoices, and earn rewards online with your free SpecCheck account.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6514741567141b12dc41a4e7_Mask%20group%20\(2\).png)Get My Free Account](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/dashboard.speccheckrx.com/?screen_hint=signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bec6_Highlight_03%20Down.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6511d8f990fe5275e8b0a383_Frame%20\(10\).png)
## Included Features
[Online Dashboard](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Order Entry](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Rewards Program](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Lab Pay](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Lab Live Chat](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Integrations](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
### Everything your practice needs, all in one place.
Order Management
View all Rx orders and live statuses with your lab partners in one place, regardless of how they were submitted. 
Access Anywhere
SpecCheck is optimized to work on all devices. Access our dashboard from anywhere with an internet connection, with no downloads or installs required.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bcfa_White%20Arrow.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</doctors>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6511d85bb3a9bc3296848b73_Frame%20\(6\).png)
### Dynamic and accurate order entry.
Built-In Validations
Our platform is thoughtfully crafted to cater to both seasoned and novice opticians. Built-in validations reduce errors and make submitting orders easy.
Lowest Redo Rate
We take pride in our industry-leading data accuracy! Our platform has the lowest redo rate of any order entry platform.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bcfa_White%20Arrow.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</order-entry>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6511d8bc8041f3a32c920fde_Frame%20\(9\).png)
### Earn free rewards, just for doing your job.
Amazon Gift Cards
Earn Amazon gift cards when you submit orders through SpecCheck. Gift cards can be earned every month and never expire!
Other Ways To Earn
SpecCheck loves rewarding its users, so be on the lookout for surveys and questionnaires where you can have the chance to win rewards by providing feedback about the platform!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/66315572b28543a174b83778_710EvQUfNLL.jpeg)
### Secure online payments.
Online Billing Portal
Easily pay your lab partner, view historical statements, access individual order invoices, download receipts, and easily configure autopay all in one place, _for participating labs._
State Of The Art Security
Our compliant and state of the art online portal uses advanced 256-bit encryption to ensure your payment details are always secure. 
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bcfa_White%20Arrow.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</lab-pay>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6511d87c7e4c9e3b112a04f0_Frame%20\(7\).png)
### Immediate lab live chat support.
Real-time Support
Quickly connect with lab customer service agents, eliminating tedious hold times on calls. Resolve issues faster and enjoy chat history that's stored forever. 
Seamlessly Integrated
Lab Live Chat is built into every page of SpecCheck's platform, making it easy for your team to get fast support from anywhere on our website.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bcfa_White%20Arrow.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</live-chat>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/6511d8f990fe5275e8b0a383_Frame%20\(10\).png)
### Connected to your current systems.
PMS / EHR Integrations
SpecCheck is connected to other software to improve your experience on the platform. Currently, we feature integrations with [Crystal PM](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.speccheckrx.com/integration/crystal>) and [Frames Data](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.speccheckrx.com/integration/frames-data>).
Always Adding More!
The talented engineering team at SpecCheck is always adding additional integrations with new systems. Click below to request an integration or learn more about what is currently supported.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c051b2e4100892bc73bcfa_White%20Arrow.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/65131d2a18d4238d9ef960d2_Frame%20\(26\).png)
Are you an Optical Lab?
[Learn More](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</optical-labs>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c0580b654d1d5299e9929c_logo%20Purple.png)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</>)
2261 Market Street, #5183San Francisco, CA 94114
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c07d5978c7efe44f8d6e49_63917683fa889830b6f3fd22_linkedIn-icon.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/linkedin.com/company/speccheck>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c07d88d38288bedfe95d46_63917683fa8898dd73f3fd21_Twiter-icon.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/twitter.com/SpecCheckRx>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c07dac8d9d63c68a5fb804_63f5c3e78690e629f09aac6d_1200px-Y_Combinator_logo.svg-p-500.png)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/speccheck>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c07dd24f9a8612317009e9_643b10c8aa88cb68d933c969_unj63uuxb8ooxctihr1w%20copy.png)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.crunchbase.com/organization/speccheck>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c051b2e4100892bc73bc66/64c07e2761bda9e68f115aa7_63917683fa8898ebacf3fd23_Youtube-icon.svg)](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@SpecCheckRx>)
CUSTOMERS

SOLUTIONS
[All-In-One Dashboard](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</doctors>)[Lab Pay](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</lab-pay>)[Order Entry](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</order-entry>)[Live Chat](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</live-chat>)
RESOURCES
[About](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</about>)[Blog](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</blog>)[Integrations](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</integrations>)[Careers](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</careers>)[Support Articles](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/support.speccheckrx.com/en/>)[Video Walkthroughs](https://www.speccheckrx.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/@SpecCheckRx>)[Contact](https://www.speccheckrx.com/</contact>)

generated_description:
### SpecCheck: Revolutionizing the Optical Industry

**Mission:**  
SpecCheck is on a mission to unify how the optical industry operates. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, this innovative company is based in Los Angeles, CA.

**What They Do:**  
SpecCheck is essentially the Swiss Army knife for optical professionals. It equips users with a comprehensive platform that facilitates accurate prescription eyewear ordering and tracking, seamless billing processes, and streamlined communication among patients, eye doctors, and lab partners. By enhancing efficiency and reducing costly errors, SpecCheck aims to boost productivity and improve workflow across the board.

**Key Features:**  
- **Order Management:** Users can view all Rx orders and their statuses in one place.
- **Dynamic Order Entry:** Designed for both seasoned and novice opticians, it features built-in validations that minimize errors.
- **Secure Online Payments:** Offers an easy billing portal that ensures payment data security with advanced encryption.
- **Rewards Program:** Users can earn Amazon gift cards simply by submitting orders through the platform.
- **Real-Time Support:** Integrated live chat for immediate assistance and troubleshooting.

**Target Audience:**  
The primary users include eye care professionals, optical labs, and enterprises looking for tailored solutions. The platform is designed to work across various devices, making it accessible and user-friendly.

**Team and Support:**  
With a small team of five, including Group Partner Diana Hu, SpecCheck is agile and focused. They offer robust customer service and numerous resources, including support articles and video walkthroughs to help users maximize their experience.

**Why It Matters:**  
In an industry where precision is paramount, SpecCheck is changing the game by making the ordering and management processes simpler and more efficient. The goal is to make the optical business not just easier, but also more collaborative and transparent.

**Curious to Learn More?**  
Visit [SpecCheck's website](https://www.speccheckrx.com) to explore their offerings and see how they can transform your optical practice.
